languages.text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете конструкцию навратного {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}. В глаза сразу бросается странный сплав, из которого изготовлены детали машины, и незнакомые вам технические узлы. В голову закрадывается подозрение, что это может быть реликвия-{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}археотех{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете конструкцию навратного {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}. В глаза сразу бросается странный сплав, из которого изготовлены детали машины, и незнакомые вам технические узлы. В голову закрадывается подозрение, что перед вами технологическая реликвия—археотех.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You carefully inspect the design of the gate {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. What immediately catches your eye is the strange alloy that was used as material for the machine's components, some of which are unfamiliar to you. You suspect this might be some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g} relic.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы внимательно изучаете конструкцию навратного {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}когитатора{/g}. В глаза сразу бросается странный сплав, из которого изготовлены детали машины, и незнакомые вам технические узлы. В голову закрадывается подозрение, что это может быть реликвия-{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}археотех{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You carefully inspect the design of the gate {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. What immediately catches your eye is the strange alloy that was used as material for the machine's components, some of which are unfamiliar to you. You suspect that you are looking at a technological relic known as archeotech.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你仔细检查着大门{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}的设计。用来制造机械部件的合金材料非常古怪，其中一部分材料你并不熟悉，这立刻引起了你的注意。你怀疑，这或许是某种被称为{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}远古科技{/g}的技术遗物。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully inspect the design of the gate {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. What immediately catches your eye is the strange alloy that was used as material for the machine's components, some of which are unfamiliar to you. You suspect this might be some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g} relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你仔细检查着大门{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}的设计。用来制造机械部件的合金材料非常古怪，其中一部分材料你并不熟悉，这立刻引起了你的注意。你怀疑，你眼前的这件造物，是某种被称为{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}远古科技{/g}的技术遗物。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con cuidado, examinas el diseño del {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} de la puerta. Lo primero que llama tu atención es la extraña aleación utilizada como material para los componentes de la máquina, algunos de los cuales te resultan desconocidos. Sospechas que podría ser una reliquia de {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arqueotecnología{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully inspect the design of the gate {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. What immediately catches your eye is the strange alloy that was used as material for the machine's components, some of which are unfamiliar to you. You suspect this might be some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g} relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con cuidado, examinas el diseño del {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} de la puerta. Lo primero que llama tu atención es la extraña aleación utilizada como material para los componentes de la máquina, algunos de los cuales te resultan desconocidos. Sospechas que se trata de una reliquia tecnológica conocida como {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arqueotecnología{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはゲートにある{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の設計を慎重に調べる。すぐに目に留まるのは、機械の部品の材料として使用されている奇妙な合金で、その中には見慣れないものも含まれている。あなたは、{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}技術遺産{/g}を見ているのではないかと思う。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully inspect the design of the gate {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. What immediately catches your eye is the strange alloy that was used as material for the machine's components, some of which are unfamiliar to you. You suspect this might be some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g} relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはゲートにある{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の設計を慎重に調べる。すぐに目に留まるのは、機械の部品の材料として使用されている奇妙な合金で、その中には見慣れないものも含まれている。あなたは、{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}技術遺産{/g}として知られる技術的遺物を見ているのではないかと疑う。{/n}
{n}あなたはゲートにある{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}の設計を慎重に調べる。すぐに目に留まるのは、機械の部品の材料として使用されている奇妙な合金で、その中には見慣れないものも含まれている。あなたは、{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}技術遺産{/g}を見ているのではないかと思う。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous inspectez méticuleusement le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} de la porte et remarquez immédiatement l'étrange alliage dont sont faites les pièces de la machine, que vous ne reconnaissez pas toutes. Vous devinez qu'il s'agit de quelque relique {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archéotechnologique{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully inspect the design of the gate {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. What immediately catches your eye is the strange alloy that was used as material for the machine's components, some of which are unfamiliar to you. You suspect this might be some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g} relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous inspectez méticuleusement le {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} de la porte et remarquez immédiatement l'étrange alliage dont sont faites les pièces de la machine, que vous ne reconnaissez pas toutes. Vous soupçonnez que vous avez devant vous une relique de ce que l'on appelle l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archéotechnologie{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du untersuchst den Tor-{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} sorgfältig. Was sofort deine Aufmerksamkeit erregt, ist die seltsame Legierung, die als Material für die Komponenten der Maschine diente, von denen dir zudem einige unbekannt sind. Du vermutest, dass es sich dabei um irgendein {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}Archäotech{/g}-Relikt{/n} handeln könnte.
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully inspect the design of the gate {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. What immediately catches your eye is the strange alloy that was used as material for the machine's components, some of which are unfamiliar to you. You suspect this might be some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g} relic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du untersuchst den Tor-{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} sorgfältig. Was sofort deine Aufmerksamkeit erregt, ist die seltsame Legierung, die als Material für die Komponenten der Maschine diente, von denen dir zudem einige unbekannt sind. Du vermutest, dass du es mit einem technologischen Relikt zu tun hast, das als {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}Archäotech{/g} bezeichnet wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kapı {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarının{/g} tasarımını özenle inceliyorsun. Gözüne ilk çarpan şey, bazı parçalarına aşina olmadığın makinenin bileşenlerinde kullanılan tuhaf alaşım oluyor. Bunun bir {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arkeotek{/g} yadigârı olabileceğinden kuşkulanıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You carefully inspect the design of the gate {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. What immediately catches your eye is the strange alloy that was used as material for the machine's components, some of which are unfamiliar to you. You suspect this might be some kind of {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g} relic.{/n}

Gözüne ilk çarpan şey, bazı parçalarına aşina olmadığın makinenin bileşenlerinde kullanılan tuhaf alaşım oluyor. Bunun bir {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arkeotek{/g} yadigârı olabileceğinden kuşkulanıyorsun.{/n}
